name: youtube-api-proxy
description: Cloud Function proxy seguro para YouTube API

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy getYouTubeVideos --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars YOUTUBE_API_KEY=TU_API_KEY_AQUI
scripts.deploy-with-limits: gcloud functions deploy getYouTubeVideos --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --max-instances=10 --memory=256MB --timeout=10s --set-env-vars YOUTUBE_API_KEY=TU_API_KEY_AQUI
